books.author: Alan Moore
books.description: A chilling story set in a dystopian future where an anarchist seeks to overthrow a totalitarian government.
books.title: V for Vendetta

books.author: Frank Miller
books.description: A dark reimagining of Batman's return to Gotham to combat crime and corruption.
books.title: The Dark Knight Returns

books.author: Art Spiegelman
books.description: A poignant tale of a Jewish man's experiences during the Holocaust, narrated through anthropomorphic animal characters.
books.title: Maus

books.author: Brian K. Vaughan
books.description: An epic tale of two lovers from warring planets, trying to raise their child amidst galactic conflict.
books.title: Saga

books.author: Jeff Smith
books.description: Follow the adventures of the Bone cousins in a magical world filled with mysteries.
books.title: Bone

books.author: Grant Morrison
books.description: A deconstruction of the superhero genre, exploring themes of identity, power, and reality itself.
books.title: Flex Mentallo

books.author: Craig Thompson
books.description: A coming-of-age autobiographical tale highlighting faith, family, and love.
books.title: Blankets

books.author: Jill Thompson
books.description: A retelling of Neil Gaiman's Sandman, exploring the backstory of the popular character, Death.
books.title: Death: At Death's Door

books.author: Daniel Clowes
books.description: A story of an ordinary man's life, filled with loneliness and simple dreams.
books.title: Ghost World

books.author: Gene Luen Yang
books.description: Two parallel stories â€“ one about a Chinese boy in a traditional past, the other about a modern-day American of Chinese descent, both struggling with their identities.
books.title: American Born Chinese

books.author: Raina Telgemeier
books.description: A middle school girl's journey through the challenges of family, growing up, and the unpredictability of life.
books.title: Sisters

books.author: John Lewis
books.description: A first-hand account of the struggles and events of the Civil Rights Movement in the US.
books.title: March

books.author: Noelle Stevenson
books.description: A fantasy adventure featuring a diverse group of characters on a quest to save their kingdom.
books.title: Nimona

books.author: Marjane Satrapi
books.description: An autobiographical account of the author's childhood and early adult years in Iran during and after the Islamic Revolution.
books.title: Persepolis

books.author: Brian K. Vaughan
books.description: In a world where every mammal with a Y chromosome suddenly dies, one man and his monkey remain.
books.title: Y: The Last Man

books.author: Tillie Walden
books.description: A beautifully illustrated tale of love and coming-of-age in the backdrop of ice skating.
books.title: Spinning

books.author: Emily Carroll
books.description: A collection of five spine-chilling tales, masterfully illustrated to haunt the reader.
books.title: Through the Woods

books.author: Jamie Hernandez
books.description: The trials and tribulations of Maggie and her friends in the punk rock scene of 1980s California.
books.title: Love and Rockets

books.author: Neil Gaiman
books.description: The tale of Dream of the Endless, who rules over the realm of dreams.
books.title: The Sandman

books.description: A memoir detailing the author's childhood to early adult years in Iran during and after the Islamic Revolution.
